newsitem.title: UK: BA appoints Wood new Asia-Pacific director.
newsitem.headline: BA appoints Wood new Asia-Pacific director.

text.p: British Airways Plc appointed John Wood as its new director Asia-Pacific effective October 1, succeeding Val Gooding who leaves at the end of August.
Wood is currently general manager and vice president for Canada and has overseen the company's first joint management and sales organisation with alliance partner USAir.

"The opportunities across the region are boundless, and I am extremely excited about the prospect of helping British Airways achieve its full potential from these markets and from its excellent relationship with Qantas ," Wood said in a statement. BA has a 25 percent stake in Qantas and in USAir.
